name: Giant Frog
description: A large, amphibious predator with a long, sticky tongue and a wide, toothless mouth, primarily found in wetlands.
memorable: It can swallow smaller creatures whole, digesting them slowly while grappling with its strong bite.
goals: To ambush and capture prey using its tongue and swallowing ability.
relations: Often encountered in swamps or wetlands; may appear in groups.
environment: Swamps, rivers, and other wetland areas.
strengths: Excellent swimmers and ambushers, can grapple and swallow prey, has a powerful jump.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit strategic capabilities; vulnerable if isolated.
attacks: Bites to grapple and swallow, pulling prey closer with its tongue.
most_powerful_ability: Swallowing creatures whole, removing them from combat temporarily.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in low-light conditions and a good Perception score of 12.
skills: Skilled at stealth, allowing it to effectively hide and ambush.
additional_information: Amphibious ability allows breathing in water and air.
Standing Leap extends its jumping capabilities up to 20 feet.
Grappling restricts target movement and actions.
Swallowed creatures take acid damage each turn.
Can pull prey closer with a Reeling Tongue action.
test_queries: large amphibious predator with sticky tongue
swamp creature that swallows prey whole
frog that pulls prey closer with tongue
giant frog that thrives in water and land
